synopsis.text: Fubuki, a young and inexperienced Destroyer-type Kanmusu, joins a specialized naval base to combat the menacing 'Abyssal Fleet' that has taken control of the seas. The Kanmusu are unique girls embodying the spirits of Japanese warships, capable of wielding powerful weaponry derived from their own souls. At Chinjufu, the naval base, Fubuki and other Kanmusu undergo rigorous training and engage in battles to protect humanity from the deep sea threat. After being saved from a perilous situation, Fubuki finds new resolve to become stronger and defend her comrades alongside the one who saved her. Witness Fubuki's growth and the Kanmusu's valiant efforts as they strive to reclaim the oceans.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
